Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/2/1985 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 9/8/1985...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/15/1985, off Dave Dravecky (SD)...
Had first career hit on 4/11/1987, off Randy O'Neal (STL)...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Cincinnati to Atlanta on 6/1/1988 (Going to CIN: C Ivan Rodriguez. Going to ATL: P Jeff Montgomery, P Curt Schilling, 1B Hal Morris)...
10/13/1988: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $4,530,000 per year, for 5 years.
